00060   void
00061   processOptions(const TMS_Data::ListJobsOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest) {
00062 
00063     //To check if the jobId is defined
00064     if (options->getJobId().size() != 0) {
00065       //To check if the jobIf exists
00066       checkJobId(options->getJobId());
00067       //To add the jobId on the request
00068       addOptionRequest("jobId", options->getJobId(), sqlRequest);
00069     }
00070 
00071     //To check if the number of cpu is defined and positive
00072     if (options->getNbCpu() > 0) {
00073       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00074       addOptionRequest("nbCpus", convertToString(options->getNbCpu()), sqlRequest);
00075     } else {
00076       //If the options is not the default value -1
00077       if (options->getNbCpu() != -1) {
00078         throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, "The number of cpu is incorrect");
00079       }
00080     }
00081 
00082     time_t fromSubmitDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getFromSubmitDate());
00083     if(fromSubmitDate != -1) {
00084       fromSubmitDate = convertUTCtimeINLocaltime(fromSubmitDate);
00085       std::string submitDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(boost::posix_time::from_time_t(fromSubmitDate));
00086       addTimeRequest("submitDate", submitDateStr, sqlRequest, ">=");
00087     }
00088 
00089     time_t toSubmitDate = static_cast<time_t>(options->getToSubmitDate());
00090     if(toSubmitDate != -1) {
00091       toSubmitDate = convertUTCtimeINLocaltime(toSubmitDate); 
00092       std::string submitDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(boost::posix_time::from_time_t(toSubmitDate));
00093       addTimeRequest("submitDate", submitDateStr, sqlRequest, "<=");
00094     }
00095 
00096     //To check the job status
00097     if (options->getStatus() != -1) {
00098       //To check the job status options
00099       checkJobStatus(options->getStatus());
00100       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00101       addOptionRequest("status", convertToString(options->getStatus()), sqlRequest);
00102     } else {
00103        if (options->getJobId().size() == 0) { 
00104          sqlRequest.append(" and status < 5 "); 
00105        } 
00106     }
00107 
00108     //To check the job priority
00109     if (options->getPriority() != -1) {
00110       //To check the job priority options
00111       checkJobPriority(options->getPriority());
00112       //To add the number of the cpu to the request
00113       addOptionRequest("jobPrio", convertToString(options->getPriority()), sqlRequest);
00114     }
00115 
00116     if (options->getOwner().size() != 0) {
00117       addOptionRequest("owner", options->getOwner(), sqlRequest);
00118     }
00119 
00120     //To check if the queue is defined
00121     if (options->getQueue().size() != 0) {
00122       BatchFactory factory;
00123       BatchType batchType  = ServerTMS::getInstance()->getBatchType();
00124       boost::scoped_ptr<BatchServer> batchServer(factory.getBatchServerInstance(batchType));
00125       batchServer->listQueues(options->getQueue()); //raise an exception if options->getQueue does not exist
00126  
00127       addOptionRequest("jobQueue", options->getQueue(), sqlRequest);
00128     }
00129   }

00136   TMS_Data::ListJobs*
00137   list() {
00138     std::string sqlListOfJobs = "SELECT vsessionid, submitMachineId, submitMachineName, jobId, jobName, jobPath,"
00139                                 "outputPath, errorPath, jobPrio, nbCpus, jobWorkingDir, status, submitDate, endDate, owner,"
00140                                 "jobQueue,wallClockLimit, groupName, jobDescription, memLimit, nbNodes, "
00141                                 "nbNodesAndCpuPerNode from job, vsession "
00142                                 "where vsession.numsessionid=job.vsession_numsessionid"
00143                                 " and status > 0 and job.submitMachineId='"+mmachineId+"'";
00144 
00145     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00146     std::vector<std::string> results;
00147 
00148     TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00149     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListJobs();
00150 
00151     msessionServer.check();
00152 
00153     processOptions(mparameters, sqlListOfJobs);
00154     sqlListOfJobs.append(" order by submitDate");
00155 
00156     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> ListOfJobs (mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListOfJobs.c_str()));
00157     long nbRunningJobs = 0;
00158     long nbWaitingJobs = 0;
00159     int jobStatus ;
00160     time_t submitDate;
00161     time_t endDate;
00162     if (ListOfJobs->getNbTuples() != 0){
00163       for (size_t i = 0; i < ListOfJobs->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00164         results.clear();
00165         results = ListOfJobs->get(i);
00166         ii = results.begin();
00167 
00168         TMS_Data::Job_ptr job = ecoreFactory->createJob();
00169 
00170         job->setSessionId(*ii);
00171         job->setSubmitMachineId(*(++ii));
00172         job->setSubmitMachineName(*(++ii));
00173         job->setJobId(*(++ii));
00174         job->setJobName(*(++ii));
00175         job->setJobPath(*(++ii));
00176         job->setOutputPath(*(++ii));
00177         job->setErrorPath(*(++ii));
00178         job->setJobPrio(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00179         job->setNbCpus(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00180         job->setJobWorkingDir(*(++ii));
00181         jobStatus = convertToInt(*(++ii));
00182         if(jobStatus==4) {
00183           nbRunningJobs++;
00184         } else if(jobStatus >= 1 && jobStatus <= 3) {
00185           nbWaitingJobs++;
00186         }
00187         job->setStatus(jobStatus);
00188         //convert the endDate into UTC date
00189         submitDate = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00190         job->setSubmitDate(submitDate);
00191         //convert the endDate into UTC date
00192         endDate = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00193         job->setEndDate(endDate);
00194         job->setOwner(*(++ii));
00195         job->setJobQueue(*(++ii));
00196         job->setWallClockLimit(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00197         job->setGroupName(*(++ii));
00198         job->setJobDescription(*(++ii));
00199         job->setMemLimit(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00200         job->setNbNodes(convertToInt(*(++ii)));
00201         job->setNbNodesAndCpuPerNode(*(++ii)); 
00202 
00203         mlistObject->getJobs().push_back(job);
00204       }
00205       mlistObject->setNbJobs(mlistObject->getJobs().size());
00206       mlistObject->setNbRunningJobs(nbRunningJobs);
00207       mlistObject->setNbWaitingJobs(nbWaitingJobs);
00208     } else {
00209 
00210     }
00211     return mlistObject;
00212   }
